ygData.subject: Re: Patch error-reinstallation EQ! Whoa!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Look for all files with extension .opt These contain things like your hotkey button settings, socials, etc, and one file that contains your friends list,
ygData.messageBody:
> B4 re-installing EQ, back-up your EQ data.
> EQ stores some of your character's stuff in your HD. Not important info that
> u can hack/modify it but u should still back them up.
>
> Some of u play EQ at home and at the office. Maybe u could advice us how its
> done.

Look for all files with extension .opt

These contain things like your hotkey button settings, socials, etc,
and one file that contains your friends list, plus some other game
settings.


--
